solution.text:
Draw a vertical line from _{k}_hrs on the x-axis upwards until it intersects the graph.
From this point draw a horizontal line towards the left until it intersects the y-axis.
This value gives the distance covered by vettel in _{k}_ hrs.
For example: Look at the graph shown below.
The graph shows that Vettel travels 160 kms in 0.5 hrs.

content.text: The distance covered by vettel to in _{k}_hrs?
